user.biography:
There is only one Bergdorf Goodman.
Share your Love Letter to NY by tagging @bergdorfs and #BGLovesNY 💌
Gentlemen, visit @goodmans.

node.text: Bergdorf Goodman is proud to support @nycnext’s mission to help build the next New York—a better and more equitable place for all. Discover the film here and visit NYCNext.org for a list of opportunities to make a positive impact on the city we love the most. #NYCNextStateofMind

node.text: With summer in full swing and a sense of wanderlust in the air, Bergdorf Goodman tapped the masterminds behind luxury brand @riannaandnina, Rianna Kounou and Nina Knaudt, to take us on a tour of Athens, Greece, and share a few of their favorite spots. From their seaside sanctuary and go-to eatery Athénée, which Kounou deems "the best lunch in the city," to fabulous flea markets and the Museum of Cycladic Art, @riannaandnina prove that there is infinite inspiration to be found in this ancient city—as if we weren't already packing our bags. Shop the brand now in store and online at BG.com.

node.text: To mark the arrival of @victoriabeckham’s Autumn-Winter 2021 collection at Bergdorf Goodman, we sat down with the British designer to showcase a few of her favorite pieces, including a draped silk midi dress in scarlet, the perfect day-to-night pink blazer, and a floral frock for every occasion. “For me, having pieces in my wardrobe that you can wear from season to season, year after year is so important,” says Beckham. Shop @victoriabeckham’s latest collection now in store and online at BG.com.

node.text: 🤍 To celebrate the arrival of @amencandles at Bergdorf Goodman, BG’s Fashion Director @lindafargo spoke with the eco-friendly brand’s founder Rodrigo Garcia to discuss their 7 fragrances for the 7 chakras, innovative mushrooms carbon negative packaging and unique hand-made process in Grasse, the perfume capitol of the world. Discover @amencandles’ “Mushroom Conversations” installation now in store on our 7th floor and shop the brand online at BG.com.

node.title: In Residence: AMEN Candles’ Rodrigo Garcia

node.text: ✨ Whether you’re basking in the sun or simply spending more time outdoors, your skin requires extra care this summer. Enter beauty guru @drbarbarasturm with the ultimate regimen. Featuring the brand's anti-inflammatory Calming Serum and just-launched Aloe Vera Gel, as well as its after-sun essentials like the Night Serum, Super Anti-aging Serum and the Good C Vitamin C Serum, this summer skincare routine is your ticket to healthy, hydrated and happy skin, all season long. Shop @drbarbarasturm now in store on the Beauty Level and online at BG.com. #BGBeauty #SturmGlow

node.title: BG’s Feel Good Beauty Guide: Dr. Barbara Sturm

node.text: As part of our exclusive launch of @burberry's Olympia bag, we are spotlighting innovative women creating the thoughtful change we need with a project curated by @sirsargent and shot by @internetbby. For our final installment, we present the trailblazing writer and transgender activist @raquel_willis. Discover more online at BG.com and shop @burberry's Olympia bag now in store on the Main Floor. #TheCraftSeriesbyBurberry

node.text: As part of our exclusive launch of @burberry's Olympia bag, we are spotlighting innovative women creating the thoughtful change we need with a project curated by @sirsargent and shot by @internetbby. Next up: digital strategist @vajiajia. Discover more online at BG.com and shop @burberry's Olympia bag now in store on the Main Floor. #TheCraftSeriesbyBurberry

node.text: 💄 Ask mother-daughter beauty entrepreneurs @sylviechantecaille and @alexchantecaille the secret behind their glowing morning skin and they’ll reveal their scientifically proven nighttime routine: a succinct combination of botanically-infused products and luxurious massage techniques. Here, they share their regimen—and for more makeup and skincare advice, we invite you to tune in for an online tutorial with @chantecaille on 5/20 at 1PM EST. RSVP: bergdorf@chantecaille.com. #BGBeauty

node.title: BG’s Feel Good Beauty Guide: Chantecaille

node.text: 🤍 Makeup artist @gucciwestman is adored for her ability to make women look and feel as radiant as possible. With @westmanatelier’s new Spring Masterclass Kit, available exclusively and in limited-edition at BG, she offers everything you need for a gorgeous spring glow—including a tutorial. Customers who purchase a kit will be invited to a private Masterclass with Westman on May 13th from 2-3pm EST, hosted by our own @lindafargo. Here, she shares a peek of what’s inside, plus a few tips. Shop the Spring Masterclass Kit now online at BG.com. #BGBeauty

node.title: BG’s Feel Good Beauty Guide: Westman Atelier

node.text: ✨To celebrate the arrival of @officiallibertine’s Spring 2021 collection, along with the brand’s 20th anniversary, designer Johnson Hartig sat down with BG Fashion Director @lindafargo for an exclusive virtual conversation. The two discuss their love of vintage, Hartig’s newly-renovated Los Angeles home and the standout pieces from the new collection. As Fargo affectionately says to Hartig, “I’m happy you had this year to grow, explore yourself and reflect on what Libertine is. We’ve come so far together and the brand has really taken on a life of its own.” Shop @officiallibertine now in store on 3 and online at BG.com.

node.title: Libertine’s Johnson Hartig in Conversation with Linda Fargo

node.text: 💫 Step into Spring with @carolinaherrera’s Creative Director @wesgordon as he takes you through the some of the brand’s standout pieces for the season. From polka dot frocks and dreamy evening gowns to updated cotton shirts and elegant embroidery, the brand’s latest collection offers a much-needed dose of optimism. “My hope is that as I share my favorite pieces you‘ll be inspired to wear them when safely reuniting with friends and family you haven’t seen in a long time to celebrate life occasions as we look forward to better days,” says Gordon. Shop all of these looks and more from @carolinaherrera now in store on 4 and online at BG.com.

node.title: In Residence: Carolina Herrera’s Wes Gordon

node.text: TOP IT OFF 🖤 Whether peplumed or embroidered, a whimsical top adds just the right amount of intrigue to a look. Shop @31philliplim and more now in store and online at BG.com.

node.text: Bergdorf Goodman is proud to support @nycnext’s mission to help build the next New York—a better and more equitable place for all. Discover the film here and visit NYCNext.org for a list of opportunities to make a positive impact on the city we love the most. #NYCNextStateofMind

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bergdorf Goodman on August 14, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, standing and outdoors.

node.text: CHANGE OF PACE 🌾 It’s hard to believe that fall is almost here. Get ahead with these transitional wardrobe pieces. Shop Bottega Veneta and more now in store and online at BG.com.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Bergdorf Goodman on August 13, 2021 tagging @ksubi. May be an image of 1 person and standing.

node.text: EASE INTO BLUE 🌊 The summer denim look is all about relaxed silhouettes, like those of the new-to-BG brand @ksubi. Available now in store and online at BG.com.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Bergdorf Goodman on August 12, 2021 tagging @therow. May be an image of saddle-stitched leather and purse.

node.text: HAND IT OVER 🖤 Modern, luxe, sensible—these are the latest must-have bags. Shop @therow and more now in store and online at BG.com. #BGInTheBag

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Bergdorf Goodman on August 11, 2021 tagging @loewe. May be an image of 1 person and standing.

node.text: RSVP YES 💛 Standout dresses for every occasion, including @loewe’s colorblock tunic. Available now in store and online at BG.com.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bergdorf Goodman on August 10, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, standing and grass.

node.text: PURELY ESSENTIAL 🍃 From stylish denim to feminine blouses, these are the everyday pieces we’re loving for fall. Shop Les Coyotes de Paris and more now in store and online at BG.com.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Bergdorf Goodman on August 09, 2021 tagging @mercedescastillo. May be an image of high-heeled shoes.

node.text: STEPPING UP 🤍 Lean into Fall’s playful heels, by Mercedes Castillo and more, for a look that’s wholly original. Shop this exclusive style and more now in store and online at BG.com. #BGOnFoot

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Bergdorf Goodman on August 08, 2021 tagging @naeemkhannyc. May be an image of 1 person and standing.

node.text: WHEN EVENING FALLS 💫 Whether richly embellished or delicately embroidered, a knockout dress is the start of a great night. Shop @naeemkhannyc and more now in store and online at BG.com.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bergdorf Goodman on August 07, 2021. May be an image of text.

node.text: BG LOVES OUR CUSTOMERS 💌 Throughout Bergdorf Goodman's "Love Letter to NY" campaign, we asked our beloved customers and visitors alike to join us by penning their own letters to this magical city we have called home for 122 years. You did not disappoint. It is our pleasure to return the favor by sharing a handful of the hundreds that we received over the past month. There are so many reasons why we love New York, but the people will always be first among them. #BGLovesNY

node.text: With summer in full swing and a sense of wanderlust in the air, Bergdorf Goodman tapped the masterminds behind luxury brand @riannaandnina, Rianna Kounou and Nina Knaudt, to take us on a tour of Athens, Greece, and share a few of their favorite spots. From their seaside sanctuary and go-to eatery Athénée, which Kounou deems "the best lunch in the city," to fabulous flea markets and the Museum of Cycladic Art, @riannaandnina prove that there is infinite inspiration to be found in this ancient city—as if we weren't already packing our bags. Shop the brand now in store and online at BG.com.
